attributes.review: I would give zero stars if I could. App gave me corona virus which my fearless president told me I would not get because everything is fine. Wanted to download the app to show those libtards that this app and election is no joke 😤 but I opened it to see someone much uglier than I remember seeing on TV. This is not kids or anyone with an underlying condition friendly. Stay safe out there 🤧😌🤟
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD 🤢🤢🤢

attributes.review: The first thing it said was “KEEP AMERICA GREAT”. Where in history has America ever been great. We took sacred land from Native Americans and we only give back a piece of it. Next it wanted me to put in my phone number, I don’t to be notified for when America reaches hell 2.0  .  Sis, I got places to be and it’s not on this piece of land. Anyways, I’m heading to Popeyes, y’all want something? TRUMP 2020 belongs on a gravestone 😘
attributes.title: This app does not hit right

attributes.review: You open the app to see a big orange man with his fist in the air. His fist being equally orange. It scared the living day lights out of me. In addition to the fear still left in me the set up of this app is very poorly designed, almost like an orange idiot created it himself, with spelling errors and false information in every sentence.... This app is a disgrace to the face of America. Truly a dreadful experience.
attributes.title: Terrible, awful, and just dreadful...

attributes.review: When I downloaded this app I saw a naked Cheeto and then I saw him at my door and he looked way worse in real life then I was hungry so I looked in my pantry and he was theDISGUSTING Cheeto and that’s when I realized...... he tried to eat all of my flaming hot Cheetos 😔so I did what I had to do...... EAT HIM and after I had a Cheeto i found him again he offered me a waffle but the I found A FINGERNAIL in my waffle😡so that is why u should not get this app
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP 🤢

attributes.review: Upon downloading this app I was quite nervous as most of the reviews were one stars. Taking a risk, I decided to download to stay up to date with MY president. However, after opening the app I saw a walking kaka on my screen. This revelation frightened me so much so that my middle fingers suffered a stroke. After that, my pet rock went kaka on my phone and it stopped working. Garbage!!
attributes.title: Terrible....just TERRIBLE

attributes.review: I saw this racist/rapist person when I first opened it that’s is unacceptable to me and my family. I would appreciate it if u could take this app off because I do not need it bothering me every min of the day with these Notification. This app is disgusting and a disgrace to the world and I wouldn’t be buying any iPhones into this is taken down from the App Store.
attributes.title: This app showed Disgusting stuff

attributes.review: Right away once I opened the app it crashed, this was an immediate red flag. How can someone of such high status have this type of app 👎 Then it began loading very slowly and wouldn’t let me use it, and it definitely isn’t my WiFi I could use my other apps easily. Overall it wasn’t a great experience and I will be deleting the app 🍊🍊
attributes.title: Bad app: crashed repeatedly 👎

attributes.review: This app is not it at all! It glitches every time I open it! Trump needs to fix this or he wouldn’t become president 2020 Or even ever! This app is trash do not download and I do not suggest it at all. This will put viruses on your phone. This is disgusting Trump. VERY. Very disappointed in you. You failed us. This app should be taken down immediately! Thank have a great day.
attributes.title: This app is not it!

attributes.review: I seen a lot of hate towards this app I and I wanted to see if it was true and people were making things up about our big orange presidents app but no I am disappointed they could of made a  much better app but our hot Cheto president can’t make a good app that doesn’t have a glitch every time I tap the app it it takes me to another sever this is not a good app.
attributes.title: Horrible app
